title: 权限组出现问题
author: 舍弃の选择
txt_content:
我更改服务器版本后玩家和我都无法破坏方块，回家，回主城都不可以求帮忙处理# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - -essentials.chat.color
    - ChestShop.shop.*（
    - eggcatcher.catch.zombie
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.sethome
    - globalmarket.create
    - globalmarket.history
    - globalmarket.pricecheck
    - globalmarket.quicklist
    - globalmarket.quickmail
    - globalmarket.send
    - globalmarket.util
    - marry.default
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.pvp
    - MyPet.user.keep.Chicken
    - MyPet.user.keep.Zombie
    - MyPet.user.leash.Chicken
    - MyPet.user.leash.MyPet-Chicken
    - MyPet.user.leash.Zombie
    - MyPet.user.release
    - RandomPlacer.use
    - rideme.ride
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&b【平静之村】'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  vip:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - essentials.fly
    - essentials.speed
    - rideme.ride
    inheritance:
    - default
    info:
      prefix: ''
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -essentials.chat.color
    - ChestShop.shop.*（
    - marry.default
    - RandomPlacer.use
    - rideme.ride
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&b【平静之村】'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

replies.author: 梦~
replies.txt_content:
请把
Default
build false 改成 true

replies.author: 舍弃の选择
replies.txt_content:
Menzor 发表于 2015-4-2 09:59
请把
Default
build false 改成 true
请问仅仅更改这一个就可以了吗

replies.author: 梦~
replies.txt_content:
请问 你升级版本 把Essentials 也升级了吗？
如果没有升级麻烦你把Ess也升级下

replies.author: 舍弃の选择
replies.txt_content:
Menzor 发表于 2015-4-2 10:01
请问 你升级版本 把Essentials 也升级了吗？
如果没有升级麻烦你把Ess也升级下 ...
- -我用的是ftp，仅仅是更改了mod与纯净的服务器端，不过还是谢谢了

replies.author: 呵呵@yujun
replies.txt_content: 个人推荐别用FTP，FTP服务器显示不清楚
